style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("mk.ru")
{
.ttt2,
.is_rtl,
.mk_insert.mk_grid0,
.fr.right_banner,
TABLE[style="margin:10px 0 0 0;"],
.mk_insert,
#vkwidget1,
.y5_ad,
IFRAME[src="http://www.facebook.com/plugins/likebox.php?href=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fwww.mk.ru&width=240&colorscheme=light&show_faces=true&border_color&stream=false&header=true&height=240"],
DIV.mk_grid0[style="background: #f0f0f0; padding: 7px 5px; margin-top: 20px;"],
DIV[style="border-bottom: 1px dashed rgb(192, 192, 192); margin: 8px 0pt 10px; padding: 15px 0pt;"],
iframe
{display: none !important;}
}
